snippet.title: Prince of Persia: The Rival Swords | Bonus Chariot Race 2 (No sands used)
snippet.description: This was legitimately hard. Ubisoft with some good level design, how many times have we seen that? I am convinced that the bonus content is just cut content re-used but they really have worked here. The difficulty is just hard enough to still be enjoyable.
